title: The Man Crushed by a Dinosaur

infobox.Title:: The Man Crushed by a Dinosaur
infobox.Japanese title:: 恐竜につぶされた男  (Kyōryū ni Tsubusareta Otoko)
infobox.Cast:: Conan Edogawa  Hiroshi Agasa  Ai Haibara  Detective Boys  Juzo Megure  Wataru Takagi
infobox.Animation director:: Masatomo Sudo and Seiji Muta (Supervisors)  Chiemi Hironaka  Keiko Sasaki (asst.)  Kosei Takahashi (asst.)  Yui Ushinohama (asst.)  Hirona Okada (asst.)  Asuka Tsubuki (asst.)  Hiroaki Takagi (asst.)  Ken Araya (asst.)  Shizuka Okumoto (asst.)
infobox.Character design:: Masatomo Sudo  Akio Kawamura (sub-character)  Hiroshi Ogawa (Design works)
infobox.Voice Cast::
Voice Cast:



Minami Takayama as Conan Edogawa  Kenichi Ogata as Hiroshi Agasa  Megumi Hayashibara as Ai Haibara  Yukiko Iwai as Ayumi Yoshida  Wataru Takagi (voice actor) as Genta Kojima, Wataru Takagi  Ikue Otani as Mitsuhiko Tsuburaya  Chafurin as Juzo Megure  Shinnosuke Musashi as Staff A  Toshiyuki Hara as Staff B  Kazuya Ichijo as Nobuhisa Shida  Kenji Hamada as Yoshito Kuchiki  Juri Kimura as Yua Katsuragawa  Yoshimasa Hosoya as Tatsuki Naito
infobox.Closing song:: Kimi to Koi no Mama de Owarenai Itsumo Yume no Mama ja Irarenai
